reviews.review: i like to poop a lot
Esta muy bueno el juego, mucho suspenso y pruebas de habilidades

This game saved my life.

I am 51.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 6 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 6th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my gamer hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand that I wanked with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side. So low that I even subscribed to my ex-wife's Only Fans.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found hatred in life. I was able to put behind me the joy and happy memories that had been residing with me. I was able to experience other people's pain and despair. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 2 minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be down bad.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak soy boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close enemies with my kid's mother. We  fight, and argue, and say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and we hate each other very much.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 6 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very unhappy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that. Now I will be hanging.

Thank you

Конченная, ебаная, залупа. Почему самый низкий ранг кидает к красным сука. Я готов искать дольше но не готов подыхать без шансов. Я пошёл за мана, у меня на нём максимум был когда-то 10, я долго не играл в итоге самый низкий ранг. ВНИМАНИЕ РАНГ СУРВОВ В ОДНОЙ ИЗ КАТОК, ВСЕ 1 красный ну ладно один 2. Вы чё ёбу дали. За сурва также какого хера 1 красный маньяк. Может этот ман с этим ебучим пати поиграет а не со мной. Я просто ебал в рот этих разрабов, раньше тоже было плохо но не настолько. Какие же они конченные пидарасы. Ты тут либо задрот либо просто иди нахуй. И по итогу ты на сурве из первых 30 каток, сбежишь раз 6 с такой системой. Не покупайте эту залупу. Играйте в доту, колитесь только блять не это. Похуй на дисбаланс, на мементо, кемп, ваще похуй. Но когда ты обязан огребать без шансов, просто потому что,  играть не особо хочется. Клипают новые дополнения, персов а проблемы игры хоть бы одну исправили.У меня 450 часов наигранно. Как тут жить новичкам я плохо понимаю, наверно фистинг длинной в 100 часов испытывать

REVERT THE METTLE OF MAN CHANGES

UPDATE FOLLOWING PINHEAD RELEASE
I'm keeping the rest of this review up just to show exactly how this has changed my opinion.  After the developers' mislead their audience about their involvement in the creation of NFTs and didn't disclose their involvement before selling the chapter, I can't recommend supporting DbD, nor do I wish anyone even play it.  It's just put a horrible taste in my mouth.  I don't want to touch this game again.

----------------------------------------------------------

Despite my time on Steam I've played it at least 30 hours more on console before getting this version, so while I'm not an expert I'm more than qualified to review it and know what I'm talking about.

This game is brilliant.  Whether you enjoy team games and outsmarting opponents or you like predicting movements and coming up with strategies you'll find something here you'll absolutely love.  It's not a perfect game, nothing ever truly is, but I've had some of the most fun playing with other people in years.

Abstracted out this is a game of hide and seek.  One person is "It" while four other people run and hide from them.  It's the details that make it special.  Be it the supremely open-ended perk system or the powers of the killers themselves, no two matches will feel the same.  You're not forced to play either the survivors nor the killers, instead you're allowed to pick whichever one is the most fun for you and focus on them if you wish.  Heck, if you're better at one or prefer the other, both sides uses the same pool of "points" to level up characters.  So as a Killer main you can play survivors with friends and use the points you earn on your killers and vice versa.

I could go on and on about the differences between killers, the perks you can unlock, strategies you can use, etc. but I genuinely believe you'll have more fun trying it out yourself.  Catch it on sale, nab any DLC that looks interesting to you, and have fun.  It's 100% recommended by me!

おもしろい。
基本サバイバー有利の減点方式ゲームで、サバイバーの行動によって減点されていく。
そして１人でも減点行為をするだけで均衡が崩れる絶妙なバランスだと思う。
セルフケア（減点行為パーク）が強いという風潮がある限りはある程度のバランスが保たれるので、必要悪だと思う。
毎回違った試合展開になるので飽きない。これからも長く遊んでいくと思います。

I Would say over all I enjoy the game. It has balance issues and the devs will do what they what and not whats best for the game as a whole most the time, but when you start this game you'll probably shit your pants for a few matches. Things can be tense when things get going and playing as a killer (at lower ranks) Makes you feel powerful. Then you soon realize 4 man teams with object beat you so badly you become a survivor main until rank reset. Also most of the community is toxic AF at times? You'll play a good and pretty normal game and end up being ranted at for camping, tunneling, etc. My suggestion is to turn off chat. focus on yourself and you'll probably have a good time chasing or being chased.
Great sense of tension. The player base is very active. There is always someone to enjoy maybe getting murdered with.
